Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2018 11:07PM panthrah wrote: my arm pit was sore and when I asked why the doctor sort of showed how its a small space to work on and maybe the surgeon was leaning on my arm pit area. the soreness went away. Ive noticed that the deeper the removal the more achy I was. that too will get better very soon. its never too late to ice :) I was always informed to keep a sports bra on for the compression ( front zip up helps a lot) . and yes excision and lumpectomy are the same thing really. you will get odd twinges every now again for a while. the nerves are just doing their thing.. which agian is total normal
